aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.aboutText: Passionate about web development, how software works and is made, and also passionate about music. In 2020 I was still wondering myself what I would do for living, it was at that time I learned how softwares were made. I decide to specialize in web development at the end of 2021 learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript and following the banck-end specialization path using Express, TypeScript and NodeJS. And today I'm working creating web pages with React and NextJS.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.ignitersDesc: NextJS t-shirt e-commerce, integrated with Stripe payment API
projects.pizzaShopDesc: React page for restaurants delivery management, allowing the restaurant to list and control the orders
projects.githubBlogDesc: React blog to visualize all your GitHub issues, integrated with GitHub API
projects.dtMoneyDesc: React page for personal finance management, allowing users to track their expenses

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.text: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my email is always open. If you have any questions or would like to connect, I'll do my best to respond as soon as possible!
contact.messageTextArea: Hi, how are you? My name is John Doe...

footer.thanksText: Thanks everybody for your attention to my portfolio!
